name: Dark Age (maxletraxle)
description:
I challenged myself to jam out a game in two weeks, but this one took three!

Theme: Dark Age

Controls (Keyboard, PS4, and Xbox 360):

Controller:

  • Move --> Left stick
  • Dodge --> [A], [Cross]
  • Parry --> [B], [Circle]
    • Hold, aim with move, and release!

Keyboard:

  • Move --> Arrow keys, WASD
  • Dodge --> [Z], [Space]
  • Parry --> [X], [Right shift]
    • Hold, aim with move, and release!

Credits:

Max Himmel - Designer + Programmer

Kenney - Micro Roguelike Sprites

soixantedeux - Venice Classic Font

BFXR - Sound
